headline: Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII): Evaluating Current Valuation After Recent Double-Digit Gains
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) stock has been on investors' radar thanks to strong recent performance, including a 14% gain over the past 3 months. Growth in both revenue and net income has contributed to this positive trend. See our latest analysis for Huntington Ingalls Industries. Momentum continues to build for Huntington Ingalls Industries, with the 1-year total shareholder return sitting at an impressive 59.9%. headline: Huntington Ingalls Supplies Virginia-Class Submarine to US Navy
summary: HII supplies the Virginia-class submarine Massachusetts to the U.S. Navy, underscoring its role as a key builder of advanced nuclear-powered vessels.

headline: Q3 Rundown: Huntington Ingalls (NYSE:HII) Vs Other Defense Contractors Stocks
summary: As the Q3 earnings season wraps, let’s dig into this quarter’s best and worst performers in the defense contractors industry, including Huntington Ingalls (NYSE:HII) and its peers.
